column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////This was the first "nice" restaurant I have been to in a long time
column2: and maybe it was the company
column3: but I really enjoyed myself. It is much larger than it looks with 3-4 big banquet halls sized rooms to fit many people. The only thing I didn't like is that they don't like half your party come and sit down before everyone arrives. My girlfriend and I got there 10 minutes before my friends and we had to stand in the hallway. We were sat in the back when our group arrived and downed some Sangria. Now
column5: and though these weren't TOO strong
column6: still delicious. The tapas were also very good
column7: with a wide array of different flavors and meats. The empanadas are to die for.
